Class TfIdfExtractor

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class TfIdfExtractor
extends Object
    Extracts TF-IDF information from Apache Solr
    Author:
    Péter Király

      FieldCounter<Double> extract(String jsonString, String recordId)
      Extracts sums and average of TF-IDF value for the schema's Solr field array without collecting the terms

    • Method Detail

      • extract

        public FieldCounter<Double> extract(String jsonString,
                                    String recordId)
        Extracts sums and average of TF-IDF value for the schema's Solr field array without collecting the terms
        Parameters:
        jsonString - The JSON string
        recordId - The record identifier
        Returns:
        Sums and average of TF-IDF value

      • extract

        public FieldCounter<Double> extract(String jsonString,
                                    String recordId,
                                    boolean doCollectTerms)
        Extracts sums and average of TF-IDF value for the schema's Solr field array
        Parameters:
        jsonString - The JSON string
        recordId - The record identifier
        doCollectTerms - A flag if the method collects terms
        Returns:
        Sums and average of TF-IDF value

      • getTermsCollection

        public Map<String,List<TfIdf>> getTermsCollection()
        Returns the term collection. The term collection is a map. The keys are the field names, the values are the list of TfIdf objects.
        Returns:
        The term collection
